sn54.12:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā lomasakaṃbhiyo sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn54.12:1.2: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yenāyasmā lomasakaṃbhiyo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ lomasakaṃbhiyaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko āyasmantaṃ lomasakaṃbhiyaṃ etadavoca:
sn54.12:1.3: “so eva nu kho, bhante, sekho vihāro so tathāgatavihāro, udāhu aññova sekho vihāro añño tathāgatavihāro”ti?
sn54.12:2.1: “Na kho, āvuso mahānāma, sveva sekho vihāro, so tathāgatavihāro.
sn54.12:2.2: Añño kho, āvuso mahānāma, sekho vihāro, añño tathāgatavihāro.
sn54.12:2.3: Ye te, āvuso mahānāma, bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti, te pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya viharanti.
sn54.12:3.1: Yepi te, āvuso mahānāma, bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti, te ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya viharanti.
sn54.12:4.1: Ye ca kho te, āvuso mahānāma, bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā, tesaṃ pañca nīvaraṇā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn54.12:4.3: Kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ;
sn54.12:4.7: vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ.
sn54.12:5.1: Ye te, āvuso mahānāma, bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā, tesaṃ ime pañca nīvaraṇā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn54.12:5.2: Tadamināpetaṃ, āvuso mahānāma, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ yathā—
sn54.12:6.1: Ekamidaṃ, āvuso mahānāma, samayaṃ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
sn54.12:6.2: Tatra kho, āvuso mahānāma, bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn54.12:6.4: Nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenā’ti.
sn54.12:6.5: ‘Evaṃ, bhante’ti kho, āvuso mahānāma, te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā nāssudha koci bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena.
sn54.12:7.1: Atha kho, āvuso, bhagavā tassa temāsassa accayena paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn54.12:7.2: ‘sace kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn54.12:7.3: “katamenāvuso, vihārena samaṇo gotamo vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ vihāsī”ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn54.12:7.4: “ānāpānassatisamādhinā kho, āvuso, bhagavā vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ vihāsī”’ti.
sn54.12:7.5: Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sato assasāmi, sato passasāmi.
sn54.12:7.6: Dīghaṃ assasanto dīghaṃ assasāmīti pajānāmi, dīghaṃ passasanto dīghaṃ passasāmīti pajānāmi …pe…
sn54.12:7.7: paṭinissaggānupassī assasissāmīti pajānāmi, paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmīti pajānāmi.
sn54.12:8.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
sn54.12:8.2: ariyavihāro itipi, brahmavihāro itipi, tathāgatavihāro itipi.
sn54.12:8.4: ariyavihāro itipi, brahmavihāro itipi, tathāgatavihāro itipi.
sn54.12:9.1: Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti, tesaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattati.
sn54.12:10.1: Ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū arahanto khīṇāsavā vusitavanto katakaraṇīyā ohitabhārā anuppattasadatthā parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanā sammadaññāvimuttā, tesaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhi bhāvito bahulīkato diṭṭheva dhamme sukhavihārāya ceva saṃvattati satisampajaññāya ca.
sn54.12:11.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya—
sn54.12:11.2: ariyavihāro itipi, brahmavihāro itipi, tathāgatavihāro itipi.
sn54.12:11.4: ariyavihāro itipi, brahmavihāro itipi, tathāgatavihāro itipīti.
sn54.12:11.5: Iminā kho etaṃ, āvuso mahānāma, pariyāyena veditabbaṃ, yathā—
